Entry.HWD: 02/1/2/Present Simple with I, you and we

GapFillInput.Title: Present Simple with I, you and we
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type the correct word in each gap.
GapFillInput.ContentGapFillInput:
A: What time doyou get up in the morning?
B: I getup at seven o'clock.
A: Do you havebreakfast at home?
B: Yes, I do.
A: Doyou walk to work?
B: No, I don't. Itake|catchthe bus.
A: And whattime do you go|getto bed?
B: I go|getto bed at eleven o'clock.
